::Autofire/Stratus::

Autofire nods, then sees the opportunity that fixing Megatron's mind 
presents.

"I know enough mechanics to fix up your mind," he says, waiting for 
something more interesting than a bunch of reunion junk to happen.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Stratus simply nods. He wasn't sure of the customs here, so he didn't 
answer.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Megatron first looked at Autofire, "Yes Autofire, you are now part 
of the
> group of Legends. Ha ha ha" he finished, he then looked at 
Stratus. "And
> you, do you wish to serve the Decepticon Empire" he asked.
> 
> Megatron looked at Cyclonus, "Then I look forward to you working 
for me" he
> said smiling. He then looked at Triggerhappy and Skullgrin. "The 
same for
> you" he said, then he snarled. "Galvatron wasted all four of your 
talents,
> I could see that through his eyes, but I wont, we will take every
> oportunity to crush our enemies" he finished, as his eyes began to 
glow
> red. "Bodicon eh" he said, now adressing the Bodicons, "Then I 
expect your
> loyalty, and look forward to seeing your results on the battle 
field.
> Motormaster" He blurted quickly. "Get Wildrider and yourselves to 
the
> repair bay" he said pointing at Wildrider's corpse. "Decepticons, 
we have
> an empire to retake. Decepticons, FOREVER" He screamed. Motormaster 
picked
> up Wildrider, and took him inside the ship, Megatron addressed his 
troops
> again. "Does anyone here have technilogical skills, to repair my 
mind?" he
> asked.
